Set.Text: The Steel Mill is an American unique building that greatly increases the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of a city. Unlike the Factory it replaces, the Steel Mill boosts production of armored, naval, and air units in the city, and [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron and [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal tiles yield +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal.
